document_data.name: Rewcol
document_data.mainbody: '''Rewcol''' was a [[wizard]] and a member of the [[Shadow Thieves]] in [[Eshpurta]] around [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Personality: The shadow thief was a sort of misanthrope. He thought that most people were like pathetic sheep and deserved (and needed) people like him to guide and direct them.
document_data.Activities: The wizard worked as an enforcer, punishing those who went against the rule of his boss in the city.
